label: Hodgson, Christopher J. & Douglas J. Williams.  2016. A revision of the family Cerococcidae Balachowsky  (Hemiptera: Sternorrhyncha, Coccomorpha) with particular  reference to species from the Afrotropical, western Palaearctic and  western Oriental Regions, with the revival of Antecerococcus Green and  description of a new genus and fifteen new species, and with ten new synonomies. Zootaxa 4091(1): 1–175.
value: Hodgson, Christopher J. & Douglas J. Williams.  2016. Zootaxa 4091(1): 1–175.
